p:
CHEST, as a long-time close ally, has written to PCCM colleagues in China to express support in this extraordinary time. In the heartfelt letter is the following statement: “You are fighting not only for the Chinese people, but for the humans of the world….We firmly believe, with the well-established PCCM team we have built together over years of effort as the main force, we will definitely win this battle.”
10
